act:
457018 THE COUNTESS OF DUFFERIN' S FUND (REPEAL) ACT, 2002
ACT NO. 65 OF 2002 [ 18th December, 2002.]
An Act to repeal the Countess of Dufferin' s Fund Act, 1957.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- third Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1575983 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Countess of Dufferin' s Fund (Repeal) Act, 2002.
1660691 2Repeal of Act 63 of 1957.- The Countess of Dufferin' s Fund Act, 1957 is hereby repealed. ----
SUBHASH C. JAIN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
